EmailTemplate.subject: The Workplace Is Always Changing.
EmailTemplate.textOnly: View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-changing-workplace.aspx?cmp=EBBSJULYBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> The workplace is rapidly changing. A generational shift, technology and AI are three major factors that continue to transform the way people work. <[[http://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/Gtblog-changing-workplace.aspx?cmp=EBBSJULYBLOG19&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Discover how to adapt to the ever-changing landscape of today’s workplace.
